en: After our conversation yesterday, something else occurred to me.
When I had my first big success - big enough to start my company, big enough to escape poverty for the first time in my life - I was stunned to find myself paralyzed.
Sometimes, success hits you even harder than failure does. It messes with your head a bit. Suddenly there's expectations, and pressure, and so much opportunity, but you find yourself drained.
I'm not sure how you can prepare yourself for this, but I want you to think about it. Try to remember who you are now. Sometimes, success changes you - and not always for the good.
